lead_paragraph: As President Obama prepares to visit Hiroshima, Japan, a new census from the Pentagon details the administration’s efforts to dismantle warheads.

headline.print_headline: Reduction of Nuclear Arsenal Has Slowed Under Obama
headline.main: Reduction of Nuclear Arsenal Has Slowed Under Obama, Report Finds

snippet: As President Obama prepares to visit Hiroshima, Japan, a new census from the Pentagon details the administration’s efforts to dismantle warheads.
abstract: Defense Dept report shows Obama administration has decreased America's nuclear arsenal less than any other presidency since Cold War; figures clash with Pres Obama's stated aim of making nuclear arms reduction central part of his legacy; president's supporters blame lack of progress on practical challenges of project and aggression of Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin.
